item.title: 马斯克的 X 标志着账户所在的位置
item.description: X 的新措施提高了用户来源的透明度。【原文：New measures at X increase transparency about where users come from.】

item.title: Blackstone 即将以 40 亿美元收购 MacLean Power Systems
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 接近收购 MacLean Power Systems，该交易对这家公用事业零部件制造商的估值可能超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing an acquisition of MacLean Power Systems in a deal that could value the utility-parts maker at more than $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fortress 将以 4.65 亿美元的债券交易出售加勒比酒店
item.description: 堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）计划出售美属维尔京群岛圣托马斯岛的两处度假村，交易资金将来自市政债券，最终将由维尔京群岛收购。【原文：Fortress Investment Group plans to sell two resorts on St. Thomas in the US Virgin Islands through a deal that will be financed by municipal bonds, and which will allow the territory to ultimately acquire the property.】

item.title: 牛肉市场对每个人来说都是破碎的
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 石油交易商对乌克兰协议持谨慎态度，认为供应转移速度缓慢
item.description: 石油交易商和分析师并不急于押注乌克兰和平计划会立即给俄罗斯向全球供应石油带来巨大变化。【原文：Oil traders and analysts aren’t racing to bet on a Ukraine peace plan bringing big immediate changes to Russia’s supply of petroleum to the world.】

item.title: 摩根大通私人银行看好 S&P 500 指数到 2027 年上涨 20
item.description: 美国股市在过去四天里反弹了 4%，这让发出全面调整即将来临警告的熊市平息了下来；现在，股市多头又开始趾高气扬了。【原文：The 4% rally in US stocks over the past four days has quieted bears warning a full blown correction was in the offing — and now equity bulls are strutting again.】

item.title: 伦敦三个议会遭受网络攻击，服务中断
item.description: 伦敦三个议会受到网络攻击的影响，服务中断，被迫启动应急计划。【原文：Three councils in London have been affected by a cyberattack that’s disrupted their services and forced them to activate emergency plans.】

item.title: 尽管亿万富豪纷纷出走，但英国预计将有更多非家庭纳税人受益
item.description: 尽管越来越多的超级富豪迁往其他地区，但英国政府仍期望通过对富裕居民优惠税收制度的重大改革获得更大的意外之财。【原文：The UK government is expecting a bigger windfall from major reforms to a preferential tax system for wealthy residents, despite a growing number of ultra-rich individuals relocating to other territories.】

item.title: 据称力拓将寻求出售在美国的一些重要矿产资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团正在寻求剥离其在美国生产硼的资产，硼是一种重要的矿物质，可用于从化肥到玻璃制造等各种用途。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is seeking to divest its US assets that produce boron, a critical mineral used in various applications ranging from fertilizers to glass making, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: S&P 将 Tether Stablecoin 稳定性评级降至 "弱 "级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将Tether的USDT稳定币维持与美元挂钩的能力下调至最低评级，并警告说，比特币价值的下跌可能会导致稳定币抵押不足。【原文：The ability of Tether’s USDT stablecoin to maintain its peg to the US dollar has been downgraded to the lowest rating by S&P Global Ratings, which warned that a drop in Bitcoin’s value could leave the stablecoin undercollateralized.】

item.title: 英国新股减税政策有望永久性撤销
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）计划给予伦敦证券交易所新上市公司三年的印花税豁免权，伦敦金融城的管理人员对此表示欢迎，认为这是促进资本市场发展的一个步骤，尽管他们更希望这一计划被完全取消。【原文：Chancellor Rachel Reeves’s plan to give newly listed companies on the London Stock Exchange a three-year exemption on stamp duty tax was welcomed by City of London executives as a step to boosting the capital markets, though they would rather it be scrapped altogether.】

item.title: 意大利即将以 5 亿欧元向国有企业出售 PagoPa 电子支付系统
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利财政部即将达成协议，以高达 5 亿欧元（5.79 亿美元）的价格将数字支付平台 PagoPa 出售给两家国有控股公司，从而推进政府精简数字资产的步伐。【原文：Italy’s Finance Ministry is near agreement to sell digital-payments platform PagoPa to two state-controlled companies for as much as €500 million ($579 million), advancing the government’s push to streamline digital assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 感恩节前降息希望升温，美国股市上涨
item.description: 美国股市周三上扬，原因是市场预期美联储将在下次会议上降息，这在感恩节假期前助推了股市的涨势。【原文：US stocks advanced on Wednesday as expectations for an interest-rate cut at the Federal Reserve’s next meeting helped fuel gains before the Thanksgiving break.】

item.title: 辛克莱尔提出收购要约后，斯克里普斯采用毒丸疗法
item.description: E.W. 斯克里普斯公司（E.W. Scripps Co.【原文：E.W. Scripps Co. adopted a so-called poison pill to thwart an unsolicited takeover bid by rival TV broadcast company Sinclair Inc.】

item.title: 前杰富瑞银行家被英国 FCA 指控内幕交易
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：A former banker at Jefferies Financial Group Inc.’s UK arm was charged with insider dealing by the markets watchdog.】

item.title: 乌克兰重启与对冲基金的认股权证重组谈判
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，乌克兰政府和乌克兰国内生产总值认股权证（GDP warrant）持有人已恢复谈判，以对这些证券进行可能的重组。【原文：Ukraine’s government and holders of the nation’s GDP warrants — debt instruments with payouts linked to economic growth — have resumed negotiations to potentially restructure the securities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波兰选择瑞典交付三艘潜艇推进国防建设
item.description: 波兰选择瑞典交付三艘潜艇，作为北约成员国加强其海上防御能力。【原文：Poland has chosen Sweden to deliver three submarines as the NATO member bolsters its maritime defense capabilities.】

item.title: 钢铁初创企业 Stegra 获得 4100 万美元的追加拨款
item.description: 资金短缺的初创公司 Stegra AB 已获得 3.9 亿克朗（约合 4090 万美元）的公共补助金，前提是这家绿色钢铁企业能够在明年春季之前获得足够的资金来完成该项目。【原文：Cash-strapped startup Stegra AB has been awarded 390 million kronor ($40.9 million) in public grant money provided the green steel venture can secure enough funds by next spring to complete the project.】

item.title: 英国考虑扩大票据市场以实现投资者基础多元化
item.description: 英国正在考虑加大票据发行力度，以实现投资者基础的多样化，此举可以发展英镑货币市场，满足稳定币发行商等潜在新买家的需求。【原文：The UK is considering ramping up its bill issuance in order to diversify its investor base, a move that could develop sterling money markets and meet demand from potential new buyers such as stablecoin issuers.】

item.title: 卢比面临压力，国际货币基金组织对印度外汇制度重新分类
item.description: 国际货币基金组织对印度的汇率制度进行了重新分类，两年前，这家总部位于华盛顿的贷款机构曾建议印度中央银行对货币市场进行过多干预。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has reclassified India’s exchange-rate regime, two years after the Washington-based lender suggested the country’s central bank was intervening too heavily in the currency market.】

item.title: 中国建筑商万科首次寻求延长人民币债券期限
item.description: 中国万科股份有限公司首次提议推迟偿还地方债券，这一出人意料的举动引发了人们对中国政府是否愿意支持甚至是最大的陷入困境的开发商的新担忧。【原文：China Vanke Co. proposed delaying repayment on a local bond for the first time, a surprise move that raises fresh concerns about Beijing’s willingness to support even the largest distressed developers.】

item.title: 投资者最新消息引发派息疑虑后，Adecco 大跌 10
item.description: Adecco Group AG 在资本市场日上提出了令投资者失望的新战略，之后该公司股价暴跌 10%。【原文：Adecco Group AG’s stock plummeted 10% after the company presented a new strategy at its capital-markets day that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 据说字节跳动将重启 Moonton 出售计划，与 PIF 的 Savvy Games 进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TikTok 的所有者字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）正在洽谈将游戏工作室上海月腾科技有限公司（Shanghai Moonton Technology Co.【原文：TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd. is in talks to sell gaming studio Shanghai Moonton Technology Co. to Saudi Arabia-based Savvy Games Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班扩大选举开支后缩小匈牙利民调差距
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在选举前采取了一系列支出举措，开始缩小反对党在民调中的领先优势。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban is starting to narrow a wide opposition lead in polls on the back of a series of pre-election spending initiatives.】

item.title: 谢因面临欧盟要求限制销售性玩偶和武器的压力
item.description: 本月早些时候，法国当局举报了Shein第三方市场上的儿童性玩偶和武器产品，Shein正面临欧盟的压力，要求其遏制这些产品的销售。【原文：Shein is under pressure from the European Union to curb sales of childlike sex dolls and weapons on its third-party marketplace after French authorities reported the products earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数降至四月中旬以来最低水平
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数上周意外降至 4 月中旬以来的最低点，在经济不确定性的背景下保持相对低迷。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week to the lowest since mid-April, remaining relatively subdued amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Lutnick 和 Pomp SPAC 交易面临加密货币暴跌的考验
item.description: 那些急于对加密货币财务公司进行交易的特殊目的收购公司正面临着一个关键时刻。【原文：The special purpose acquisition companies that rushed to make deals for cryptocurrency treasury firms are facing a critical juncture.】

item.title: 萨科齐推翻竞选超支判决的最后一搏失利
item.description: 法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）因涉嫌选举资金阴谋刚刚出狱，但他又因在 2012 年竞选连任失败时超支而被判定有罪，在推翻另一项有罪判决的最后一次努力中败下阵来。【原文：Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy, freshly out of jail over an alleged electoral funding conspiracy, has lost his final bid to overturn a separate guilty finding for overspending in his failed 2012 re-election campaign.】

item.title: 赛峰集团计划到 2030 年将印度采购量提高 400
item.description: 法国航空发动机制造商赛峰集团（Safran SA）将在2030年前把从印度采购的零部件翻五番，达到5亿欧元（5.79亿美元），这凸显了印度作为一个主要航空市场的地位正在不断提升。【原文：French aircraft engine maker Safran SA will quintuple component procurement from India to €500 million ($579 million) by 2030, highlighting the country’s rising stature as a major aviation market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯在银行寻求救助时提出资本 "红线 "问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）发出了迄今为止最强烈的信号之一，即正在努力减轻银行监管负担的高官们不会削弱银行的财务实力。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos gave one of the starkest signals yet that top officials who are working to lighten the regulatory burden on banks won’t water down their financial strength.】
